description: Strict multi-document retrieval evaluation schema. A query is a hit only when all docs in at least one gold_set are retrieved.

question.description: User-style question to evaluate retrieval/rerank coverage.

gold_sets.description: Alternative complete document sets. A stage hits at k if top-k contains all docs from any one set.

doc_ids.description: Union of all ids in gold_sets (diagnostic only).

doc_kind.description: Optional category tag for stratified metrics.

doc_subkind.description: Optional subcategory tag for stratified metrics.
